content: Hex cap screw Electrogalvanized hex cap screw ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Standard fixings for support systems- - - ### FEATURES:Features Versatile – available in various lengths and appropriate for a wide range of applications Easy to install – provides secure and stable connections that help resist movement Applications Various connections with Hilti Modular Support Systems ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Carbon steel - ASTM A 307 Surface finish: Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized Environmental conditions: Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) Technical Data | Material composition | Carbon steel - ASTM A 307 | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) ### ITEMS- 411766 - Hexagon bolt zinc 1/2 x 1 - Package Size 50 pc - 411767 - Hexagon bolt zinc 1/2 x 1-1/4 - Package Size 50 pc - 411768 - Hexagon bolt zinc 1/2 x 1-1/2 - Package Size 50 pc - 411764 - Hexagon bolt zinc 3/8 x 1-1/4 - Package Size 100 pc - 411765 - Hexagon bolt zinc 3/8 x 1-1/2 - Package Size 100 pc
